feed.title: site
feed.subtitle: My personal website where I display my music and blog. Under development, feel free to suggest improvements.

entry.title: Go Is Go..od!
entry.content: I’ve started learning Go (Golang?) with a great guide. I am looking forward to improving my testing workflow. Also my old website is officially dead. This is now the place to be. I have a lot of ideas of what I want to achieve with it, but we’ll see how that progresses. There are a lot of things I want to implement, but some are a bit tricky without any backend, like a contact form. As they say, “Perfection is the enemy of progress”. That’s what they say right? Anyway that is my motto for this website. Have a great summer!
entry.summary: I’ve started learning Go (Golang?) with a great guide. I am looking forward to improving my testing workflow. Also my old website is officially dead. This is now the place to be. There are a lot of things I want to implement, but some are a bit tricky without any backend, like a contact form. As they say, “Perfection is the enemy of progress”. That’s what they say right? Anyway that is my motto for this website. Have a great summer!

entry.title: Jekyll Is Awesome
entry.content: Today I learned about Jekyll with this awesome tutorial. Now I have deployed my website using Github Pages, ain’t it cool? That means I have to learn som markup aswell… Great! Can’t wait to see how this unfolds.
